## SendableProtocol.withdrawDebtTokenFromStabilityPool() method

Withdraw DebtToken from Stability Deposit.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withdrawDebtTokenFromStabilityPool(amount: Decimalish): Promise<SentProtocolTransaction<S, ProtocolReceipt<R, StabilityDepositChangeDetails>>>;
```

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[SentProtocolTransaction](./lib-base.sentprotocoltransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [ProtocolReceipt](./lib-base.protocolreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, [StabilityDepositChangeDetails](./lib-base.stabilitydepositchangedetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the Stability Deposit's [collateral gain](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) and [ProtocolToken reward](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.protocoltokenreward.md)<!-- -->.
